content: In the morning you have breakfast, you have lunch mid-afternoon, you have a snack during the day, and in the evening you have dinner.
translations: ita:La mattina si fa colazione, si pranza a met√† pomeriggio, si fa uno spuntino durante il giorno e la sera si cena
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by nicholas_martin (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
